title: New: Lockah –  Please Lockah, Don't Hurt'Em EP
body: So after a couple of teases from the young Aberdeen based producer, **[Lockah](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Lockah/170348676392239?fref=ts)**, we’re finally able to listen to his second EP, following his debut effort, released on **Mad Decent**. It’s….well, more of the same. Clearly influenced by his Scottish contemporaries, **Rustie** and **Hudson Mohawke**, it’s a bright, theatrical and fit inducing ride. Sure, the references to genres and ‘club culture’ in general can, at times, seems marginally too sickly sweet, but it manages to stick to a vivid and let’s face it, fun as fuck formula without a hint of shame or compromise . And, if i may say so, we’re all a little bit better off for it.
